main event: On May 8, 1962, multiple witnesses reported seeing bright unidentified flying objects in the Marksville, Leesville, and Colfax area of Louisiana.
interesting points: The objects were described as round, disc-shaped and metallic, with glowing lights around their rim., Witnesses included local law enforcement officers and private citizens., The objects were observed for approximately ten minutes, with one object initially seen stationary before moving rapidly., At least two different colors of objects were reported, including a reddish-orange glow and a bright white light., Weather conditions were clear at the time, with visibility reported to be unlimited.
sighted object: Bright metallic objects, round and disc-shaped
witness description: Local law enforcement officers and private citizens
